name: Squirreltopia Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Soundtrack for Squirreltopia (Note: includes some overlap songs from Domestic Dog Soundtrack)

  • 1. System Start [0:17]
  • 2. Enter the Squirrel [0:52]
  • 3. Shadowtail [1:02]
  • 4. Forest [2:10]
  • 5. Arctic [3:02]
  • 6. Desert [2:22]
  • 7. Alien [2:18]
  • 8. Factory [2:44]
  • 9. Machines [3:20]
  • 10. Party [3:40]
  • 11. This Beat is Nuts [Bonus Track] [1:24]

By Sean Davy
